# Automated Culture Media Preparation Instrument Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Tender Details

* Reference Number: WS4472854498
* Solicitation Number: WS4472854498
* Publication Date: May 30, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: July 3, 2024, 2:00 PM local time
* Posting URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19869179](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19869179)

## Procurement Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites sealed proposal submissions for the acquisition of an automated culture media preparation instrument. The proposed solution should include:

* Delivery of the instrument
* Installation of the instrument
* Training on the use of the instrument
and be located in Saint-Hyacinthe, Quebec, Canada.

## Key Requirements

* The instrument should be capable of automating the preparation of culture media.
* The instrument should meet the requirements outlined in Annex A, Statement of Requirement.
* The proposed vendor should demonstrate the ability to deliver, install, and train the end user in the use of the instrument.

## Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price offered.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement opportunity is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
